bwwExcerpt: Yes, "Hamilton" is that good, and the still youthful Lin-Manuel Miranda can be mentioned in the same sentence with Sondheim and even Cole Porter. No need to go into all the lyrics here, but Miranda has a syllable-by-syllable rhyme for "pseudonym," and many other words, that is absolutely delicious.
